authors.name: Miranda S. Spivack

title: The art of access: Strategies for acquiring public records in an increasingly anti-media world
description: Miranda S. Spivack discusses the challenges of obtaining public records in a world that is becoming increasingly hostile towards the media, and shares strategies for successfully accessing this information.
